QuestData.Title: Ikky's Egg
QuestData.Description: <Miraculously, this single egg has eluded the ravagers.$B$BA small tag has been lovingly tied around the base of the egg. It reads "Ikky.">
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Ikky hatch from the Kaliri Egg in Shadowglade.
QuestData.RewardText: <The hatchling springs immediately to flight, then looks at you expectantly and cheeps.>
